|rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ''[[Planet]]''s site indicates FW is available for a v2 revision. :It is dated Aug. 2013 ([[TP-LINK TL-WR841N v7.x]]) This one, which on the DD-WRT forums in 2012, is presumed to be the v1 unit. Additional specifications, per '''Planet''''s datasheet, follow... *Dimensions (L x W x H): 174 mm x 110 mm x 23 mm *Weight: 280 g Default settings are per ''Planet'''s manual. :The sample SSID is shown as '''default'''. ==Links of Interest== :[http://www.planet.com.tw/en/product/images/34683/C-WNRT-627_s.pdf Datasheet] :[http://www.planet.com.tw/en/product/images/34683/WNRT-627%20User%20Manual_v1.0.pdf Manual] [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=721934 On the '''DD-WRT Forums''']
[http://www.speedguide.net/routers/planet-wnrt-627-300mbps-80211n-wireless-broadband-2226 On '''SpeedGuide.net'''] [[Category:English Documentation]]
